title: Quick-Pickled Onions
full_text:
Quick-Pickled Onions
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Resting Time
15 mins
Total
20 mins
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
Raw onion
, sliced, cut into rings, or diced (as much as you need for your recipe)
Kosher
or sea salt
Red wine vinegar
to cover
Directions
Put the onion in a non-reactive vessel along with a large pinch of salt. Pour enough vinegar on top to just cover. Let stand, stirring once or twice, for at least 15 minutes and up to 1 hour (the onion will grow softer and more pickled-tasting as it sits). Drain, then add to sandwiches, salads, and other dishes where raw onion would be used.
Serious Eats / Amanda Suarez
Dairy-free
Vegan
Vegetarian
Pickling
Onions
